Module guigame
Package guigame.logic

Class Constants

java.lang.Object
guigame.logic.Constants
public abstract class Constants
extends java.lang.Object
Maintains important constants which are accessed throughout the code. Cannot be instantiated.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static int BALL_DIMENSION_SIZE
    The height and width for the Ball.
    static float BALL_X_SPEED
    The ball's current x-speed, initial value: 3.
    static float BALL_X_SPEED_UPDATE
    The update value for the ball's x-speed after each paddle collision
    static java.awt.Color bgColor
    Color for the background.
    static int DELAY_END_OF_POINT
    The time to wait before showing start-next-point-button [in milliseconds].
    static java.awt.Color fgColor
    Color for unselected elements in the foreground.
    static java.awt.Color fgHoverColor
    Color for unselected elements in the foreground when they are hovered over.
    static java.awt.Color fgHoverSelectedColor
    Color for selected elements (buttons) in the foreground when they are hovered over.
    static java.awt.Color fgSelectedColor
    Color for selected elements (buttons) in the foreground.
    static int GAME_BOARD_HEIGHT
    The height of the GameBoard
    static int GAME_BOARD_WIDTH
    The width of the GameBoard
    static int MAX_AI_PADDLE_SPEED
    The max speed of an AI player.
    static int MAX_BALL_Y_SPEED
    The maximum y-speed for the ball
    static java.awt.Color sliderMarkedColor
    Color for the marked part (left of the thumb) of the sliders.
    static int WINNING_SCORE
    End game at a max score of 5 points for one person
